title: Daily Creation
prompt: An infinite desert landscape where the sand dunes are frozen into sharp, vibrating audio frequency spikes and cymatic patterns. Bright orange (#FF4500) and royal blue (#4169E1) light traces the sharp crests of the soundwaves. Minimalist composition, gold dust (#FFD700) suspended in the air. 8k resolution, raytraced shadows, sharp focus on the crystalline sand grains, volumetric atmospheric haze, visualized soundwaves reacting to invisible sound.
